StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.title: Glitterworld officer
StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Though glitterworlds are peaceful places, they often remain prepared for war. [PAWN_nameDef]'s unit rarely saw any real action. Though [PAWN_pronoun] pursued [PAWN_possessive] artistic hobbies, [PAWN_possessive] subordinates preferred to entertain themselves by brawling, so [PAWN_nameDef] got good at breaking up fights.

StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.title: Novelist
StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] lived on a glitterworld, penning wildly successful novels. [PAWN_pronoun] lived a carefree lifestyle, spending [PAWN_possessive] days writing and [PAWN_possessive] nights partying... and never did a day's manual labour in [PAWN_possessive] life.

StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.title: VR designer
StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] designed virtual reality simulations for glitterworld citizens. [PAWN_pronoun] paid great attention to the details of [PAWN_possessive] world, including learning all [PAWN_pronoun] could about plant life to make [PAWN_possessive] landscapes more realistic.

StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.title: Glitterworld minister
StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] secured a minor, but important, position in the government of a glitterworld. [PAWN_pronoun] had ample time for pleasure and indulgence, and enjoyed the opulence, but still appreciated the value of hard work, as well, and always strove to keep [PAWN_possessive] citizens content.

StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.title: Xenobiologist
StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a xenobiology professor at a glitterworld university, with a bit of an artistic bent. In addition to teaching, researching and attending professional conferences, [PAWN_pronoun] also managed an art gallery.
